articles.author: Lesley Wroughton, Tabelo Timse
articles.title: In South Africa, Trump’s false claims spark a renewed racial reckoning - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s false “genocide” claims forced race to the forefront of national conversation in South Africa in a way rarely seen since the end of apartheid.
articles.content: CAPE TOWN, South Africa False claims made by U.S. President Donald Trump in the Oval Office on Wednesday that South Africas Black majority is trying to wipe out White Afrikaners have roiled this coun… [+6614 chars]
